name: courseguide
description: guide for the start of part3 of Fullstack Open

scripts.build:ui: rmdir /s /q dist && cd ..\..\part2\courseguide && npm run build && xcopy /E /I dist ..\..\part3\courseguide\dist
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push

author: Diego Zapata
